prompts: Create a cute, small Pokemon resembling a donkey with earthy tones and a playful demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon that showcases a strong, sturdy build, perfect for ground battles.
Show me a quadrupedal creature with brown fur and a lively personality, ideal for grassy fields.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience, with distinctive hoofed feet and a charming appearance.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a young mule, with a mix of brown and white colors.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in rural habitats, showcasing an energetic and friendly nature.
Make a unique Pokemon that has a robust build, with shades of brown and a determined expression.
